name: Ocean Diver
description:
Take your boat and dive into the ocean in search for pearls and treasures.  Trade pearls at the Shop of the Docks to upgrade your Dive Suit, which will increase the Oxygen timer, plus also increase your swim speed, enabling you to swim deeper and deeper each dive.

Collect all 8 Treasures to complete the game.  A diving grade will be issued after the game is over on the results screen.

Controls

Boat:  Left and Right Arrow Keys to Move

Diver:  Left and Right Arrow Keys to Rotate, and Up  Arrow Key to Swim Forward.

Created for the Ludum Dare Jam 48 - Theme: Deeper & Deeper
